charges.charge_description: 21:841(a)(1), 846 CONSPIRACY TO DISTRIBUTE COCAINE, SCH II (1s)

charges.charge_disposition: Count 1s and 4s: 235 Months Custody Bureau of Prisons. 5 Years Supervised Release with conditions. Count 2s: 235 Months Custody Bureau of Prisons concurrent to Counts 1s and 4s. 3 Years Supervised Release with conditions, concurrent. Count 3s: 60 Months Custody Bureau of Prisons to be served consecutively to sentence imposed on Counts 1s, 2s and 4s. 2 Years Supervised Release with conditions, concurrent. Defendant is to pay a special assessment fee of $200.00 for Counts 1s, 2s, 3s, 4s. [RESENTENCED ON 12/5/96: 292 months imprisonment on Counts 1s and 4s to be served concurrently. 240 months imprisonment on count 2s to be served concurrently. Count 3s is vacated pursuant to Bailey. 5 years supervised release on counts 1s and 4s. 3 years supervised release on count 2s. $150.00 special assessment fee for counts 1s, 2s and 4s.] (1s)
